Posts.Content: Hello ladies. My name is Brittany and I'm from Florida. I do not have breast cancer, but my aunt does. I pray for you all. I joined this forum today because I was doing my exam and found a lump in my breast. I'm making an appointment to see the doctor tomorrow morning. Please keep me in your thoughts. I'm only 19 years old, so this is very scary for me. Thank you all so much, and I look forward to hearing all of your stories.
Posts.Signature: Finding a Cure for You... Brittany "I can do all things thru Christ who strengthens me." Phil. 4:13
Posts.Title: I'm so young

Posts.Content: Danielle, Thank you so much for your post, I really appreciate it. I'm praying for your mother and I hope she heals and recovers beautifully! God bless you!
Posts.Signature: Finding a Cure for You... Brittany "I can do all things thru Christ who strengthens me." Phil. 4:13
Posts.Title: I'm so young

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for your replies. I really appreciate it. I have an appointment to get it checked out on Monday morning. I appreciate you ladies encouraging me. Thank you so much. I hope you all are doing wonderful, let me know!
Posts.Signature: Finding a Cure for You... Brittany "I can do all things thru Christ who strengthens me." Phil. 4:13
